cause.description:
Never mind video games, iPods, and cell phones. It has indeed been proven by multiple institutions of science that reading is the best thing a child can do. There is no reason why all children should have this same, but great opportunity. Please donate! You would be helping a child get on the road to success in their future!
1. Their is no excuse for not reading, unless of course you have a handicap from doing so (i.e. blindness)
cause.mission: help children and young adults maintain a good reading habit;
cause.name: Let's Read America
